Is the `getblockdeltas` command only available through the `curl` interface?

No, the `getblockdeltas` command is not only available through the `curl` interface. It can also be used directly in the Verus command-line interface, as shown in the first example: `verus getblockdeltas 00227e566682aebd6a7a5b772c96d7a999cadaebeaf1ce96f4191a3aad58b00b`.

Examples:
> verus getblockdeltas 00227e566682aebd6a7a5b772c96d7a999cadaebeaf1ce96f4191a3aad58b00b
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getblockdeltas", "params": ["00227e566682aebd6a7a5b772c96d7a999cadaebeaf1ce96f4191a3aad58b00b"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
